title: Self-Contained Glamping and Log Cabins near Blue Mountains with BBQ Facilities
description:
Have a tryst with nature near the picturesque Blue Mountains with a stay at this 6000-acre tranquil retreat. This eco-friendly haven offers cosy, self-contained tents, cottages or log cabins, each with a private terrace overlooking the stunning Turon River or mountainscape. Spend your days exploring the surrounding wilderness, spotting kangaroos and wombats, or casting a line for trout.

For dining options or family fun, the surrounding area and charming town of Capertee is a short drive away, offering local eateries and activities like horse riding, canoeing, or adventure sports.
offer_address: 942 Turon Gates Road, Capertee, New South Wales 2846, Australia
